title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: SOL Gains 7.5%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Render (RENDER) joined Solana (SOL) as a top performer, gaining 7.8%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3536.7, up 3.8% (+130.21) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

18 of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: RENDER (+7.8%) and SOL (+7.5%).

Laggards: HBAR (-0.5%) and XLM (-0.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 3.8% with 18 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in RENDER (+7.8%) and SOL (+7.5%).
